Posts.Content: Garciamx wrote: Hello, I had a double mastectomy on 07/14/09. I had problems with one of my draining bulbs and it was removed early. The PS put pressure on my breast and while in her office I drained through the hole of the drain that was removed. Well since then I have been draining through my stitches..this has been ongoing for a week now. My question is..Has anyone else experienced this? I also feel that my breast feels full and it looks a bit swollen. I don't want to freak out cause what is draining is not red blood but a yellowish fluid and I don't have a fever. But I am so scared and I think just tired from all the pain on the side where I am having all this trouble. Any thoughts/advice would be appreciated. Thank you, Maria Maria Dx 7/30/2010, IDC, Stage IV, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Has anyone drained through their stitches? Garciamx Kayleigh3483

Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2009 07:51PM Garciamx wrote: **Update** I went to the DR and since I am still draining through the stitches and it does not appear to be letting up..the PS is going to remove my tissue expander, clean me out and seal me up again. We will try to put in the tissue expander in 6-8 mos. Although I am seriously debating whether to just give up on having implants. I am so tired of all of this.Â

This of course stinks..I have a 20 & 16 yr old who is begging me to live longer..I hate this!
